snippet: The payroll processor ADP said that businesses added 237,000 jobs last month, compared with 203,000 in May.
abstract: Payroll processor ADP says businesses added 237,000 jobs in June, compared with 203,000 in May.
lead_paragraph: The payroll processor ADP said that businesses added 237,000 jobs last month, compared with 203,000 in May.

headline.main: ADP Reports 237,000 Jobs Added by Businesses in June
headline.print_headline: ADP Reports 237,000 Jobs Added by Businesses in June
